content.value:
We are located in the northeast corner of the Chorro de Quevedo square, La candelaria historical center of Bogotá.

We offer lovely bedrooms, all with big colonial windows and high roofs.

We provide quality and comfort in simple, shared and matrimonial rooms, to tourists who wish to spend an extraordinary evening. Musical atmosphere, restaurant, excellent location and more, in Hostal Casa Quevedo.

This charming colonial style house declared historical heritage of the city offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. There is a patio and a small fireplace. Hostal Casa Qu evedo is located in a quiet area, just a 15-minute drive from the financial district. Bicycle rental is available and laundry services are offered.

description.description: Casa Quevedo Hostel is a colonial house located in the first square in Bogota: El chorro de Quevedo. The interior design of the hostel is primary based on wood furniture and floors, plus a bar restaurant at the first floor.
